data.text: @FlyWithIX Please advise whether is PCR Test to be done for people travelling from DXB to Mangalore and from Mangalore to DXB if the person is vaccinated in UAE. Also are the  kids below 12 years are exempted from PCR Test. Kindly update the website with latest travel guidelines.
